law.history: Repealed 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 303, sec. 53. --Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 227, sec. 2, effective June 17, 1954. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 162, sec. 28. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2739-41.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Explosives and other blasting devices in mines.
